name: annotation-resample
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Resample an annotation file to different meshes.

Resample an annotation file from the source mesh to the target mesh.

Only annotations in surface space are modified, no changes are made to annotations in other spaces.  The -surface-pair option may be repeated for additional structures used by surface space annotations.

inputs.name: surface_pair
inputs.description: pair of surfaces for resampling surface annotations for one structure

type.name: surface_pair
type.description: pair of surfaces for resampling surface annotations for one structure

inputs.name: source_surface
inputs.description: the midthickness surface of the current mesh the annotations use

inputs.name: target_surface
inputs.description: the midthickness surface of the mesh the annotations should be transferred to
